This show is about the behind-the-scenes production of the various artists

Our recording, rehearsals, etc.

I, Sasaki, had a release event for our new song released on December 13th.
We had a release event.
We went back to the original format of the release event.
The way we put the audience in and the closeness of the event, the volume of the voice, and the feeling of the audience.
I think it makes the audience feel differently.
I think there are a lot of differences in the way the audience feels about it.

Thank you for your hard work!

I'm so relieved now that the show ended without a hitch, but I think it must have been really hard for the fans to hear the chorus for the first time, because we were struggling like that at first.
I'm sure it was a lot of work, but I'm so glad that the fans were able to follow us.
I'm really proud of you.
Did you wear any of your old costumes?
Yes, they were.
It was really interesting.
I don't know.
I think it's really nice to have moments that remind us of the past, so I think it was a wonderful live performance.
I hope we can continue to do our best in the future.

I re-recorded this album with the current members,
All the songs from the past were sung by me, but the junior members sang their own parts,
But the junior members will sing their own part of the songs, plus their own part,
The younger members sing their own song assignments plus the ones they would like to sing,
If they liked it, they had a chance to sing that part of the song,
Some members got more assignments there,
Some of the members got more song assignments there, but it was a style of recording that had not been used very often before,
We recorded 13 songs in a style that had not been used very often,
I remember that it was a lot of fun.
I remember how much fun it was to record 13 songs in that style,
I was very happy to hear her voice, which has a core, but I love it so much, and it makes me want to listen to it all the time, on the recording.
I was so happy to hear her voice on the recording,
When I listen to her voice live, it enters my body and stays with me forever.
Hmmm...

Yes, there was a feeling that stayed with me, and I was listening to her, thinking that she has a very attractive voice, and that she expresses herself in a very attractive way, but there was one thing I was wondering about.
Rabbit? There is a lyric card, and a rabbit-like thing appeared next to the lyric card, and I wondered what it was,
I wondered what it was, and when I told Yahana about it, she said it was her usual character,
The way she proceeded with the recording, it was like, "Yes, I understand.
She was like, "Yes, yes, I understand. I felt like, "Oh, that's Riai-chan," and her individual recording style comes out in each recording.
So, Riai-chan's recordings are very interesting, and there is something cool about the way she says "yes" and does it without hesitation,
It was really fun to watch, and I was reminded once again what a wonderful voice she has.
